verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: And when the stars fall off
verse.verse_3: And when the seas are flown away.
verse.verse_4: And when the graves are scratched.
verse.verse_5: Each soul shall then know what it has sent forth and what has been left behind.
verse.verse_6: O man! What has deceived you with regard to your Lord, the Noble One.
verse.verse_7: Who created you, then perfected you, then proportioned you.
verse.verse_8: Into whatever from He willed, He fashioned you.
verse.verse_9: Nothing but you belie the judgement.
verse.verse_10: And undoubtedly, above you, are some guardians.
verse.verse_13: Undoubtedly, the righteous are in bliss.
verse.verse_14: And undoubtedly, the evildoers are necessarily in Hell.
verse.verse_15: They shall enter it on the Day of Judgement.
verse.verse_16: And they will not be able to hide therefrom.
verse.verse_17: And what you know what the Day of Judgement is.
verse.verse_18: Again, what you know, what the Day of Judgement is.
verse.verse_19: The day when no soul shall have power for any other soul. And the entire command on that day is of Allah.
